data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Yu Mei, Zhao, Zeng Qi, Wang, Jian Ming (2015): A new species and a new record of Trischistoma Cobb, 1913 (Nematoda: Enoplida: Trischistomatidae) from Shanxi Province, China. Zootaxa 3937 (3): 564-576, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3937.3.8
